title: 10 Fitness Hacks for New Year’s Resolution Success
sub_head: Set meaningful goals to achieve bigger-picture fitness resolutions
body:
As The Wall Street Journal’s What’s Your Workout columnist, I have started many a New Year vowing to exercise more and eat healthier. And just like 80% of people who make New Year’s resolutions, I have often dropped them before Super Bowl Sunday.
Still, I have figured out a few tricks to staying committed for the long run. Success starts with setting the right resolutions.
